name: Remy Delacroix
description: A shadowy figure with connections to the criminal underworld, Remy Delacroix trades in information and secrets, for the right price.

name: Lena Kovac
description: A no-nonsense bouncer and enforcer, Lena Kovac ensures that troublemakers are swiftly dealt with and maintains order in the bar.

name: Jack Malone
description: The grizzled owner and operator of the criminal bar, Jack Malone is a former smuggler with a checkered past.

name: Elena Vasquez
description: The head botanist and chief scientist of the hydroponics facility, Dr. Vasquez oversees the cultivation of crops and research into sustainable agriculture.

name: Mark Damian
description: A skilled engineer responsible for maintaining the facility's equipment and ensuring the smooth operation of the hydroponics systems.

name: Alex Wong
description: A dedicated investigative journalist, Alex Wong is always on the lookout for the next big story, no matter the risks.

name: Sarah Park
description: A charismatic and respected journalist, Sarah Park is the face of the news station, known for her insightful reporting.

name: Markus Chen
description: A young and eager recruit, Officer Chen is known for his dedication to duty and willingness to go the extra mile.

name: Elena Vargas
description: The head of the colony's police force, Captain Vargas is a seasoned law enforcement officer with a no-nonsense attitude.
